security: The document is released with deletions, indicating that some information is still considered sensitive and is being withheld.
summary: This document is an exhibit cover sheet regarding Kenneth C. Griggs, including a copy of a letter written by Philip LaChapelle Jr. to Griggs' adopted father, Cecil L. Griggs, in November 1967.
summary_one_paragraph: This unclassified document, dated January 24, 1968, is an exhibit cover sheet from the JFK Assassination System, concerning Kenneth C. Griggs, a PFC born in Korea on December 25, 1946. Prepared by the 115th MI Group (IV), it references file number 8008-9182 and includes a copy of a letter written on November 20, 1967, by Philip LaChapelle Jr. of Chicago to Mr. Cecil L. Griggs of Boise, Idaho, who is identified as the subject's adopted father.
title: Exhibit Cover Sheet
